Bus-Transportation-Management-System-main.routes.admin_routes module

routes.admin_routes.register_admin()[source]

Register a new admin.

Expects JSON payload with admin details. Returns JSON message and HTTP status code.

routes.admin_routes.login_admin()[source]

Login an admin.

Expects JSON payload with username and password. Returns JWT token, username, message, and status code.

routes.admin_routes.get_all_drivers()[source]

Get all drivers.

Returns a list of all drivers with status code 200.

routes.admin_routes.assign_driver(driver_id)[source]

Assign a driver by ID.

Moves driver from drivers table to assigned_drivers table.

routes.admin_routes.delete_driver(driver_id)[source]

Delete a driver by ID.

Returns success or error message.
